TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed Dispatcher extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供管理執行緒之工作項目佇列的服務。

span.span: Provides services for managing the queue of work items for a thread.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 維護優先順序的佇列特定執行緒的工作項目。The maintains a prioritized queue of work items for a specific thread. 當建立執行緒，它就會成為唯一可以與執行緒相關聯即使已關閉。When a is created on a thread, it becomes the only that can be associated with the thread, even if the is shut down. 如果您嘗試取得目前的執行緒和所關聯的執行緒，將會建立。If you attempt to get the for the current thread and a is not associated with the thread, a will be created. A也會建立，當您建立。A is also created when you create a . 如果您建立背景執行緒，請務必關閉發送器在結束的執行緒之前。If you create a on a background thread, be sure to shut down the dispatcher before exiting the thread. 如果關閉，無法將它重新啟動。If a is shut down, it cannot be restarted. 在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]、只能由存取相關聯。In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], a can only be accessed by the it is associated with. 例如，背景執行緒無法更新的內容相關聯上[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]執行緒。For example, a background thread cannot update the contents of a that is associated with the on the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] thread. 為了讓背景執行緒存取屬性，背景執行緒必須委派工作給聯[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]執行緒。In order for the background thread to access the property of the , the background thread must delegate the work to the associated with the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] thread. 這會透過使用或。This is accomplished by using either or . 是同步方法，和為非同步。 is synchronous and is asynchronous. 作業加入佇列的位於指定。The operation is added to the queue of the at the specified . 如果上呼叫，已關閉，傳回的 status 屬性設。If is called on a that has shut down, the status property of the returned is set to . 所有的方法上，除了，是無限制執行緒。All of the methods on , with the exception of , are free-threaded. 衍生自具有執行緒相似性。Objects that derive from have thread affinity. 衍生自是無限制執行緒時就會凍結。Objects that derive from are free-threaded when they are frozen. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Freezable 物件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)。For more information, see [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何將作業到。The following example shows how to place an operation onto a . 此範例的完整原始程式碼，請參閱[單一執行緒應用程式與長時間執行的計算範例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160038)。For the full source code of this example, see [Single-Threaded Application with Long-Running Calculation Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160038). 首先，建立委派可接受任何引數。First, a delegate is created that accepts no arguments. [!code-csharp[ThreadingPrimeNumbers#ThreadingPrimeNumberInit](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ThreadingPrimeNumbers/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#threadingprimenumberinit)] [!code-vb[ThreadingPrimeNumbers#ThreadingPrimeNumberInit](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ThreadingPrimeNumbers/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#threadingprimenumberinit)] 下一步呼叫。Next, is called. 此呼叫接受兩個參數： 優先權，用來設定為，並會透過委派的執行個體中傳遞的回呼`NextPrimeDelegate`。This call to takes two parameters: the priority, which is set to , and the callback, which is passed in through an instance of the delegate `NextPrimeDelegate`. [!code-csharp[ThreadingPrimeNumbers#ThreadingPrimeNumberBeginInvoke](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ThreadingPrimeNumbers/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#threadingprimenumberbegininvoke)] [!code-vb[ThreadingPrimeNumbers#ThreadingPrimeNumberBeginInvoke](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ThreadingPrimeNumbers/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#threadingprimenumberbegininvoke)]

summary.span: 在 關聯的執行緒上以非同步方式執行委派。

span.span: Executes a delegate asynchronously on the thread the is associated with.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]，建立的執行緒可以存取該物件。In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], only the thread that created a may access that object. 例如，會開始從主要 UI 執行緒背景執行緒無法更新的內容UI 執行緒上所建立。For example, a background thread that is spun off from the main UI thread cannot update the contents of a that was created on the UI thread. 為了讓背景執行緒存取的內容屬性將，背景執行緒必須委派工作給與 UI 執行緒相關聯。In order for the background thread to access the Content property of the , the background thread must delegate the work to the associated with the UI thread. 這會透過使用或。This is accomplished by using either or . 是同步方法，和為非同步。 is synchronous and is asynchronous. 作業會加入到事件佇列位於指定。The operation is added to the event queue of the at the specified . 為非同步。因此，控制項會立即傳回呼叫的物件後呼叫。 is asynchronous; therefore, control returns immediately to the calling object after it is called. 傳回物件，可以用互動與委派，當委派被在事件佇列。 returns a object that can be used to interact with the delegate when the delegate is in the event queue. 所傳回物件可以用數種方式，與指定的委派，例如互動：The object returned by can be used in several ways to interact with the specified delegate, such as: - 變更委派的暫止，所以執行事件佇列中。Changing the of the delegate as it is pending execution in the event queue. - 從事件佇列中移除的委派。Removing the delegate from the event queue. - 等候要傳回的委派。Waiting for the delegate to return. - 取得在委派傳回它的後面的值會執行。Obtaining the value that the delegate returns after it is executed. 若為多個呼叫會在相同，將會執行被呼叫的順序。If multiple calls are made at the same , they will be executed in the order the calls were made. 如果上呼叫，已關閉，傳回的 status 屬性設。If is called on a that has shut down, the status property of the returned is set to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 停用發送器處理是一種進階的方法，目的是要避免不相關的重新進入的機會。Disabling dispatcher processing is an advanced method that is intended to eliminate the chance of unrelated reentrancy. 停用處理的影響是，如下所示：The effects of disabling processing are as follows: - [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr#initcap](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clrsharpinitcap-md.md)] 鎖定不會在內部提取訊息。 locks will not pump messages internally. - 不允許物件推送。 objects are not allowed to be pushed. - 不允許訊息處理。Message processing is not permitted. 結構呼叫時傳回可用來重新啟用發送器處理。The structure that returns when it is called can be used to re-enable dispatcher processing. 呼叫上結構重新啟用處理。Calling on the structure re-enables processing. 只有在執行緒上呼叫相關聯。 can only be called on the thread the is associated with. ## Examples 下列範例顯示如何停用發送器處理和重新啟用發送器處理。The following example shows how to disable dispatcher processing and re-enable dispatcher processing. 在中，稱為**使用**陳述式。 is called in a **using** statement. 傳回要處置時做為物件的結構**使用**封鎖完成。 returns a structure that is used as the object to be disposed when the **using** block finishes. 當上呼叫結構發送器處理已重新啟用。When is called on the structure, dispatcher processing is re-enabled. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]，建立的執行緒可以存取該物件。In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], only the thread that created a may access that object. 例如，會開始從主要 UI 執行緒背景執行緒無法更新的內容UI 執行緒上所建立。For example, a background thread that is spun off from the main UI thread cannot update the contents of a that was created on the UI thread. 為了讓背景執行緒存取的內容屬性將，背景執行緒必須委派工作給與 UI 執行緒相關聯。In order for the background thread to access the Content property of the , the background thread must delegate the work to the associated with the UI thread. 這會透過使用或。This is accomplished by using either or . 是同步方法，和為非同步。 is synchronous and is asynchronous. 作業會加入到事件佇列位於指定。The operation is added to the event queue of the at the specified . 是同步作業。因此，控制項不會傳回至呼叫的物件直到回呼傳回之後。 is a synchronous operation; therefore, control will not return to the calling object until after the callback returns.

MemberSignature.Value: public void InvokeShutdown ();
.method public hidebysig instance void InvokeShutdown() cil managed
Public Sub InvokeShutdown ()
public: void InvokeShutdown();

summary.span: 以同步方式初始化 的關閉程序。

span.span: Initiates the shutdown process of the synchronously.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 要求不受限制的 UI 權限。 demands unrestricted UI Permissions. 當開始關閉，就會引發事件和設`true`。When the starts to shut down, the event is raised and is set to `true`. 便不會關閉完全直到事件佇列會回溯。The does not shut down completely until the event queue unwinds. 當發送器完成關閉，就會引發事件和屬性設定為`true`。When the Dispatcher finishes shutting down, the event is raised and the property is set to `true`. 關機程序開始時，所有暫止的工作佇列中的項目都被中止。Once the shutdown process begins, all pending work items in the queue are aborted.

span.span: for shutting down the dispatcher.

summary.span: 會進入執行迴圈。

span.span: Enters an execute loop.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A代表處理暫止的工作項目迴圈。A represents a loop that processes pending work items. 發送器處理迴圈中的工作項目佇列。The Dispatcher processes the work item queue in a loop. 迴圈被指在範圍內。The loop is referred to as a frame. 初始迴圈通常由應用程式呼叫而起始。The initial loop is typically initiated by the application by calling . 進入迴圈，參數代表`frame`。 enters a loop represented by the parameter `frame`. 在迴圈的每個反覆項目會檢查屬性類別以決定迴圈是否應該繼續，或如果應該停止。At each iteration of the loop, the will check the property on the class to determine whether the loop should continue or if it should stop. 允許屬性明確設定，而且它會遵守屬性。 allows for the property to be set explicitly and it respects the property on the . 這表示當關閉啟動，使用預設的框架實作將會結束，可讓所有巢狀的畫面格結束。This means when the starts to shut down, frames that use the default implementation will exit, which enables all nested frames to exit. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用來達到類似的結果為[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]方法。The following example shows how to use a to achieve similar results as the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] method. [!code-csharp[dispatchersnippets#DispatcherDispatcherFrameDoEvents](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DispatcherSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#dispatcherdispatcherframedoevents)] [!code-vb[dispatchersnippets#DispatcherDispatcherFrameDoEvents](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DispatcherSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#dispatcherdispatcherframedoevents)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 處理迴圈中的事件佇列。The processes the event queue in a loop. 迴圈被指在範圍內。The loop is referred to as a frame. 初始迴圈通常由應用程式呼叫而起始。The initial loop is typically initiated by the application by calling . 主要執行畫面格將會繼續直到已關閉。The main execution frame will continue until the is shutdown.

summary.span: 發生於 完成關閉時。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當關機程序的已啟動，就會引發事件和設`true`。When the shutdown process of a is started, the event is raised and is set to `true`. 不完全會關閉，直到事件佇列會回溯。The does not shutdown completely until the event queue unwinds. 當發送器完成關閉，就會引發事件和屬性設定為`true`。When the Dispatcher finishes shutting down, the event is raised and the property is set to `true`. 關機程序開始時，所有暫止的工作佇列中的項目都被中止。Once the shutdown process begins, all pending work items in the queue are aborted.

summary.span: 發生於 開始關閉時。

span.span: Occurs when the begins to shut down.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當關機程序的已啟動，就會引發事件和設`true`。When the shutdown process of a is started, the event is raised and is set to `true`. 不完全會關閉，直到事件佇列會回溯。The does not shutdown completely until the event queue unwinds. 當發送器完成關閉，就會引發事件和屬性設定為`true`。When the Dispatcher finishes shutting down, the event is raised and the property is set to `true`. 關機程序開始時，所有暫止的工作佇列中的項目都被中止。Once the shutdown process begins, all pending work items in the queue are aborted.

summary.span: 發生於當擲回執行緒例外狀況且透過 或 執行委派期間無法攔截時。

span.span: Occurs when a thread exception is thrown and uncaught during execution of a delegate by way of or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 藉由委派的執行期間擲回的例外狀況時，會引發這個事件或是無法攔截。This event is raised when an exception that was thrown during execution of a delegate by way of or is uncaught. 處理常式可以標示例外狀況為已處理，這可以防止內部例外狀況處理常式呼叫。A handler can mark the exception as handled, which will prevent the internal exception handler from being called. 必須小心避免建立次要的例外狀況，並攔截，就會發生寫入此事件的事件處理常式。Event handlers for this event must be written with care to avoid creating secondary exceptions and to catch any that occur. 建議您避免配置記憶體，或執行任何資源的處理常式中的大量作業。It is recommended to avoid allocating memory or doing any resource intensive operations in the handler. 事件提供方法來引發事件。The event provides a means to not raise the event. 第一次，就會引發事件，而且當上設`false`、不會引發事件。The event is raised first, and If on the is set to `false`, the event will not be raised.

summary.span: 發生於在篩選階段擲回執行緒例外狀況且透過 或 執行委派期間無法攔截時。

span.span: Occurs when a thread exception is thrown and uncaught during execution of a delegate by way of or when in the filter stage.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 藉由委派的執行期間引發的例外狀況的篩選器階段會引發這個事件或而且無法攔截。This event is raised during the filter stage for an exception that is raised during execution of a delegate by way of or and is uncaught. 無法在此時間點 （第一個可能發生例外狀況） 回溯呼叫堆疊。The call stack is not unwound at this point (first-chance exception). 必須小心避免建立次要的例外狀況，並攔截，就會發生寫入此事件的事件處理常式。Event handlers for this event must be written with care to avoid creating secondary exceptions and to catch any that occur. 建議您避免配置記憶體，或執行任何資源的處理常式中的大量作業。It is recommended to avoid allocating memory or doing any resource intensive operations in the handler. 事件提供方法來引發事件。The event provides a means to not raise the event. 第一次，就會引發事件，而且當上設`false`、不會引發事件。The event is raised first, and If on the is set to `false`, the event will not be raised.

summary.span: 判斷呼叫的執行是否可以存取這個 。

span.span: Determines whether the calling thread has access to this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有執行緒建立在可以存取。Only the thread the is created on may access the . 這個方法是公用的。因此，任何執行緒可以檢查以查看是否有存取權。This method is public; therefore, any thread can check to see whether it has access to the . 之間的差異和是傳回布林值，如果呼叫的執行緒沒有存取權和擲回例外狀況。The difference between and is returns a Boolean if the calling thread does not have access to the and throws an exception. ## Examples 下列範例會使用判斷執行緒是否有存取權的執行緒，上建立。The following example uses to determine whether a thread has access to the thread that a was created on. 此方法會採用物件做為引數轉型成。The method takes an object as an argument, which is cast to a . 方法的呼叫以驗證的存取權的執行緒。The method on the of the is called to verify access to the thread. 如果呼叫執行緒能夠存取、藉由只存取的成員會更新。If the calling thread has access to the , the is updated by just accessing the members of the . 如果呼叫的執行緒沒有存取權，就會擲回。If the calling thread does not have access, an is thrown. 此範例中攔截例外狀況，並將推送委派，它會接受做為引數，拖曳至的。This example catches the exception and pushes a delegate, which accepts a as an argument, onto the of the . 這將執行更新作業。This will do the work of updating the . span.span: An awaitable object that asynchronously yields control back to the current dispatcher and provides an opportunity for the dispatcher to process other events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可讓您可以暫時釋目前發送器的執行控制項，因此它可以執行其他工作，例如處理其他事件。This method provides a way for you to temporarily release execution control to the current dispatcher so it can do other work, such as process other events. 使用`await`，或`Await`在 Visual Basic，對傳回值的運算子，將控制權傳回給目前的發送器。Use the `await`, or `Await` in Visual Basic, operator on the return value to return control to the current dispatcher. 使用這個方法，如果想要讓您的應用程式有機會處理事件，而您的應用程式正在執行許多 UI 執行緒上的工作。Use this method if want to give your app a chance to process events while you app is doing a lot of work on the UI thread. 例如，您可以使用這個方法在更新控制項的長時間執行迴圈。For example, you can use this method in a long-running loop that updates a control. 這個方法相當於呼叫方法然後傳入。This method is equivalent to calling the method and passing in .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可讓您可以暫時釋目前發送器的執行控制項，因此它可以執行其他工作，例如處理其他事件。This method provides a way for you to temporarily release execution control to the current dispatcher so it can do other work, such as process other events. 使用`await`，或`Await`在 Visual Basic，對傳回值的運算子，將控制權傳回給目前的發送器。Use the `await`, or `Await` in Visual Basic, operator on the return value to return control to the current dispatcher. 使用這個方法，如果想要讓您的應用程式有機會處理事件，而您的應用程式正在執行許多 UI 執行緒上的工作。Use this method if want to give your app a chance to process events while you app is doing a lot of work on the UI thread. 例如，您可以使用這個方法在更新控制項的長時間執行迴圈。For example, you can use this method in a long-running loop that updates a control.
